item.title: BL-15/US-91 South at I-15 South
item.description: BL-15/US-91 South at I-15 South (Exit 89). Use I-15 south for Pocatello and Twin Falls. Continue south on US-91 for Fort Hall. This is the southern end of BL-15 (Blackfoot).

item.title: BL-15 South/US-91 South Approaching I-15
item.description: BL-15 South/US-91 South approaching I-15 (Exit 89) in Bingham County.

item.title: BL-15/US-91 South Approaching I-15
item.description: BL-15/US-91 South approaching I-15 (Exit 89). This is the south end of the Blackfoot business loop.

item.title: BL-15 South/US-91 South - Fort Hall Indian Reservation
item.description: Entering the Fort Hall Indian Reservation on BL-15 South/US-91 South.

item.title: BL-15 South at US-91
item.description: BL-15 South at US-91 in Blackfoot. Turn left for US-91 north to Idaho Falls and West Yellowstone (Montana). Turn right for BL-15 South/US-91 South to Pocatello.

item.title: I-15 South - Exit 89
item.description: I-15 south at Exit 89 - US-91/South Blackfoot.

item.title: Emd BL-15 North at I-15 South/US-26 West
item.description: End BL-15 North at I-15 South (Exit 93)/US-26 West and approaching ID-39 in Blackfoot. Turn left for I-15 South to Pocatello and Twin Falls (via I-86). Continue straight for US-26 West to Arco and ID-39/Aberdeen Jct.

item.title: BL-15 - Blackfoot
item.description: BL-15 on Bridge St. in Blackfoot.

item.title: US-91 South at BL-15 - Blackfoot
item.description: US-91 South at BL-15 in Blackfoot. Turn right on Bridge St. for BL-15 North/To I-15; continue south for BL-15 South/US-91 South.

item.title: US-91 South at BL-15 - Blackfoot
item.description: US-91 South at BL-15 in Blackfoot. Turn right for BL-15 North to Aberdeen (via ID-39) and Arco (via US-26). Continue straight on US-91 South/BL-15 South for Pocatello and I-15.

item.title: End BL-15 North at I-15/US-26/ID-39 Junction
item.description: End BL-15 North at I-15/US-26/ID-39 Junction in Blackfoot. Turn right for I-15 North/US-26 East to Idaho Falls and Butte (Montana). Continue under freeway for I-15 south to Pocatello, and for US-26/ID-39 to Arco. This is the northern end of the Blackfoot business loop.

item.title: US-26 East at I-15 North and BL-15
item.description: US-26 East at I-15 North and BL-15 in Blackfoot. Use I-15 North/US-26 East to Idaho Falls and Butte (Montana). Continue straight for BL-15 to Blackfoot city center.

item.title: US-26 East at I-15 South
item.description: US-26 East at I-15 South in Blackfoot. Use I-15 south for Pocatello. Continue straight for Blackfoot and I-15 north to Idaho Falls.

item.title: I-15 North - Exit 89
item.description: I-15 north approaching Exit 89, BL-15/US-91/Blackfoot, approaching 1 mile.
